term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - molecular nucleation in polymers
term.title: molecular nucleation

item.text: The initial crystallization of a small portion of a macromolecule, after which further crystallization is thermodynamically favoured. Molecular nucleation may give rise to a new crystal or increase the size of a pre-existing one.
